name: Wilder Dinosaur Hunt
description: Wilder Dinosaur Hunt is an amazing realistic wild dinosaur hunting game of 2018. Where your sniper shooting and hunting skills are going to be tested. As a professional sniper shooter, take your sniper rifle and jump in to the dangerous deadly jungle and become a expert hunter. Be brave and stay safe in this dark jungle. Dino Hunting is your main objective in this game and while hunting make sure your sniper shooting skills are up to the mark. Wilder Dinosaur Hunt has simple and smooth control, real environment and climate effects and amazing game play that keeps you busy for many hours.
